0_to_90_days: Enroll in an online course on AI-assisted development tools like GitHub Copilot.
Practice using Copilot in small coding projects to understand its capabilities and limitations.
Take a certification course on DevOps fundamentals and CI/CD pipelines.
Set up a basic CI/CD pipeline for a personal project to gain hands-on experience.
Enroll in a machine learning engineering course focusing on model deployment.
Work on a project that involves building and deploying a simple machine learning model.
90_to_180_days: Integrate Copilot into daily development tasks and seek feedback from peers on its effectiveness.
Participate in forums and communities focused on AI-assisted development to stay updated on best practices.
Collaborate with the DevOps team at Infosys to understand the existing CI/CD processes.
Implement advanced CI/CD practices in a team project and document the improvements in software delivery.
Join a community or group focused on ML/AI engineering to exchange knowledge and experiences.
Contribute to open-source ML projects to gain practical experience in model deployment.

axisGaps.description: Proficiency in using AI tools like Copilot for code generation, review, and debugging.
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automation tools for efficient software delivery.
Skills in building, fine-tuning, and deploying machine learning models.
Leveraging AI tools to enhance team output and collaboration.
Proficiency in both front-end and back-end development for comprehensive project involvement.
Ensuring ethical use of AI and fostering responsible innovation within the organization.
Expertise in cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud for scalable solutions.
Commitment to ongoing learning and skill development to stay current with industry trends.
Effective management of projects to ensure timely and within-budget delivery.
Working effectively with different departments to achieve common objectives.
Maintaining and improving client relationships to ensure satisfaction and retention.
Developing and executing strategic plans to achieve business goals.
Knowledge of security protocols and data protection measures to safeguard information.
Understanding of blockchain technology and its applications in various industries.

skillGaps.reasoning: As AI transforms network management, the ability to leverage AI for optimizing network performance is crucial. Nikhil's existing skills in network engineering and networking technology provide a strong foundation. He can start by taking courses on AI applications in network management and experimenting with AI tools in real-world scenarios.
skillGaps.description: As AI transforms network management, the ability to leverage AI for optimizing network performance is crucial. skillGaps.reasoning: AI is revolutionizing IT service management by automating routine tasks and improving service delivery. He can begin by learning about AI-driven ITSM platforms and gaining hands-on experience with these tools.

marketBenchmark.rationale: As an employee at Infosys, a leading IT services company, the benchmarks reflect the high demand for AI and cloud capabilities driven by client needs. AI-Assisted Development (x0) and Cloud Computing (x2) are critical, with rising trends in AI tools and cloud infrastructure. ML/AI Engineering (x1) and Cybersecurity (x3) are also important due to the increasing reliance on AI models and data protection. DevOps (x4) remains stable but essential for efficient delivery. Blockchain (x5) is emerging but not yet critical. Full-Stack Development (x6) is expected for comprehensive project involvement. AI-Augmented Team Productivity (y0) and Upskilling (y6) are rising trends, reflecting the need for continuous improvement and leveraging AI for team efficiency. Client Relationship Management (y1), Project Management (y2), Strategic Planning (y4), and Cross-Functional Collaboration (y5) are stable but essential for maintaining client satisfaction and achieving business goals. AI Ethics (y3) is becoming more important as responsible AI use gains attention.

executiveSummary:
Nikhil Sonwane, an employee at Infosys, has been evaluated for skill gaps in the context of market positioning and peer comparison. The assessment reveals significant gaps in critical areas such as AI-Assisted Development & Copilot Fluency, DevOps & Continuous Integration, ML/AI Engineering & Model Deployment, AI-Augmented Team Productivity, and Full-Stack Development. These gaps are particularly concerning given the high market benchmarks in these domains, with Nikhil scoring 0.0 against market benchmarks ranging from 7.0 to 8.5. This places him in the lower-left quadrant, indicating a critical need for upskilling to remain competitive in the market.

To address these gaps, it is recommended that Nikhil focuses on developing proficiency in AI-driven network optimization and AI-powered IT service management, leveraging his existing skills in network engineering and IT services consulting. Additionally, while not critical, acquiring knowledge in agile methodologies, banking industry knowledge, business analysis, data analysis, and defect management could further enhance his marketability. Immediate steps should include enrolling in relevant courses and gaining hands-on experience with AI tools and platforms to bridge these skill gaps effectively.

slides.title: Executive Summary
bullets: Nikhil Sonwane evaluated for skill gaps.
Significant gaps in AI, DevOps, ML/AI, and Full-Stack Development.
Critical need for upskilling to remain competitive.
speakerNotes: This presentation provides an overview of Nikhil Sonwane's skill gaps and recommendations for upskilling.
The assessment highlights critical areas where Nikhil needs improvement to stay competitive in the market.

slides.title: Context
bullets: Evaluation based on market positioning and peer comparison.
speakerNotes: Nikhil Sonwane is currently employed at Infosys.
This evaluation aims to identify skill gaps in comparison to market benchmarks and peers.

slides.title: Heatmap of Skill Gaps
speakerNotes: The heatmap shows significant gaps in critical skill areas.
These gaps are measured against market benchmarks, highlighting areas for improvement.

slides.title: Multi-Axis Quadrant
bullets: Nikhil is in the lower-left quadrant.
Focus on AI, DevOps, and Full-Stack Development.
speakerNotes: Nikhil's position in the lower-left quadrant indicates a critical need for upskilling.
The focus should be on improving skills in AI, DevOps, and Full-Stack Development.

slides.title: Skill Gaps
speakerNotes: The skill gaps are significant, with percentages indicating the extent of the gap compared to market benchmarks.
Addressing these gaps is crucial for Nikhil's professional growth.

slides.title: Pros
speakerNotes: Nikhil has strong networking skills, which are valuable for professional relationships.
His experience at Infosys provides a solid foundation for further skill development.

slides.title: Cons
speakerNotes: Nikhil lacks proficiency in agile practices and project management.
He also has significant gaps in critical areas like AI and DevOps.

slides.title: Upskilling: AI-Assisted Development
bullets: Practice using tools like GitHub Copilot.
speakerNotes: To address the gap in AI-assisted development, Nikhil should enroll in relevant courses and practice using tools like GitHub Copilot.

slides.title: Upskilling: DevOps & CI
bullets: Take certification courses on DevOps fundamentals.
Set up a basic CI/CD pipeline.
Collaborate with DevOps team at Infosys.
speakerNotes: For DevOps and CI, Nikhil should take certification courses and gain hands-on experience by setting up CI/CD pipelines.

slides.title: Upskilling: ML/AI Engineering
bullets: Enroll in machine learning engineering courses.
Work on projects involving model deployment.
Gain hands-on experience with ML models.
speakerNotes: To improve ML/AI engineering skills, Nikhil should enroll in relevant courses and work on projects involving model deployment.

slides.title: Roadmap
bullets: 0-3 months: Enroll in courses and gain basic proficiency.
3-9 months: Integrate new skills into daily tasks.
9-12 months: Collaborate on projects and seek feedback.
speakerNotes: The roadmap outlines the steps for upskilling over the next 12 months.
The focus is on gaining basic proficiency, integrating new skills, and collaborating on projects.

slides.title: Next Steps
bullets: Set up hands-on projects for practice.
speakerNotes: The next steps involve identifying and enrolling in relevant courses, setting up hands-on projects, and seeking feedback for continuous improvement.
